name: Digging Down
description:
Digging Down is a fast-paced mining adventure where you travel through the caves below to eventually find the large diamond hidden in the depths. On your way, you will collect money and gems to buy upgrades to speed up your descent between runs so you can make it to the bottom.

WASD to move, Left mouse to dig, Right mouse to throw explosives, and F to fullscreen

Digging Down was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper

A Game by MiltonNH25, Choco, and Xander Ton
